Edited out URL. Josh, feel free to PM localnet if you wish to pass the URL on. (Google works well for such things, too.)

localnet: if you're referring to hosting Quest games, then the only way I know to *directly* do it (not linked to textadventures) is to get the Quest web server code from git, build it and deploy it on a server - not a trivial task.

If you're referring to hosting other sorts of games, then you'd be best off googling for game servers. I'm sure there's lots of info out there!
